oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soldiers ready to go out on patrol

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eight soldiers from the 1st Infantry Division about to go out on patrol. Two of the men appear to be carrying M79 grenade launchers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military personnel; Soldiers; Military uniforms; Arms & armament; Helmets
United States. Army. Infantry Division, 1st; Vietnam War, 1961-1975; Vietnam
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ammons, Christopher D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1st Infantry Division ("The Big Red One") was organized in 1917 and has been in active service ever since.
